12.8.19  3:53 am   Do you agree that if someone fails or refuses to acknowledge their own merit, that their good qualities and skills are practically useless?

     no

     done that

white u, white e, green q, white s, white t, white i, white o, white n, white s?

     to stay in a similar design theme as the already existing pages on the site

     on ice

     YES, I HAVE TONS OF IT!!

     i like the part where you get to turn the page

     everyone needs internet access

     for superstitious reasons i don't think i can do that right now

     maybe 2

     how about going into a frenzy

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

     now i am curious who is #2

     no i am friends at you

     almost

     bill wurtz dot com. actually no i am sure it is somewhere around belvidere castle

     i always confuse it with beanut putter

     yes, inspect the shorts first

     the japan one turned out ok, so for the next round it was time to take it up a notch, but i was feeling restless so i took it up all the notches

     it's like a squirrel getting nuts

     i'd have to answer it

     slime

     pray to it

12.7.19  11:13 pm   'Got to know what's going on' is easily one of your best songs for me. When you do a live show would you please perform it?

     sure

      Also thanks for helping me wake up.

     AH YES, THAT'S ME, THE BRINGER OF WAKEFULNESS

12.7.19  11:07 pm   what is the possessive form of pant and pants. is it pant's, and for pants, is it pants'?

     that's fine, but i wouldn't complain if you said pants's, because the s' thing is kind of ridiculous and everyone does it wrong anyway

     do it more often (with breaks in between)

     absolutely

     everything is butt. don't worry about it

     ever since i became an "adult"

     thank you for your sudden outburst of friendliness

     eakfast l

Because I always feel bad when I put butter on toast but he butter doesn't have any butter on it, because putting more butter on butter us just making the butter bigger. So one day will I be able to butter butter without making just more butter?

     you are supposed to use mayonaise

12.7.19  3:14 pm   it seems that you are asked quite often about bread. sure, it's a common food, but why is it such a common topic here?

     i don't know

      are you viewed as some sort of authority on bread?

     i hope not. i can't even identify what's bread and what's not bread

      (... or does the bread have authority on you?)

     that depends whether it's short bread or very very tall, towering bread

     no
